description:
It was discovered that LibSass incorrectly handled certain specially crafted
sass file. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of
service or other unspecified impact.

libsass.description: C/C++ port of the Sass CSS precompiler

title: LibSass vulnerabilities
action: In general, a standard system update will make all the necessary changes.
isummary: Several security issues were fixed in LibSass.
